channel.title: CVE Feed for Nvidia Corporation -- NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nvidia Corporation -- NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver

item.title: CVE-2017-6252|2024-09-16T17:33:03.260Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20windows%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer handler where a NULL pointer dereference may lead to a denial of service or potential escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2017-6254|2024-09-16T19:04:56.532Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20windows%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape where a pointer passed from an user to the driver is used without validation which may lead to denial of service or potential escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2017-6255|2024-09-16T18:43:59.392Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- nvidia%20windows%20gpu%20display%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Windows GPU Display Driver contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape where an improper input parameter handling may lead to a denial of service or potential escalation of privileges.
